text: Was there for Fiba finals. Sitting by the court sides wasn't humid or too warm in the evening till night. Nice space for various events right outside stadium train station and kallang wave mall.
Nice for running events and jogging. Big clean space for events, activities and fun.

OCBC Square is a clean and spacious area that connects the various sports facilities to the adjacent Kallang Wave Mall. Signs like these ensure the maintenance of the area. Language choice of English, combined with image of cigarette and rubbish and red slash clearly indicate prohibited activity. Placement of the sign is also in a high visible location on a lamppost.

Did Snoopy Run at OCBC Square.
Great place. Convenient to go to (just outside mrt), spacious enough for all of us to move comfortably. Close to facilities like toilets and food.
Gone there to join the pokemon raid organized by PAGO SG FAM. Really a good place to shop and play. Super convenient.
